page.title: 08GOVERNMENT cont'd
page.content: and{Regional Councils.}The{C.C.}has no power. The{C.C.'s}main aim is to promote Maybole locally and further afield. The{Manpower}and{General Pur- {poses committees}work towards this. The{M.C.}directs community projects eg preparing premises and a garden as a senior citizens centre, using members of the {Youth Training Scheme}and the{ {unemployed.}The{G.P.C.}has set up a {Junior C.C.,}produced a pictorial history of Maybole and supervised a town twinning with{Crosne,}a small town outside{Paris.}It also helps with the town Pipe Band, the BMX (junior stunt bike) club, and summer play- schemes. Future plans include a Maybole pamphlet with drawings and his torical notes, a tape/slide of similar content and a celebration of the town' s 800th centenary in 1993. Funding is from{Gov't}via{Kyle-Carrick D/Council.
